喜.definition: to be fond of; to like; to enjoy; to be happy; to feel pleased; happiness; delight; glad

喜出望外.definition: to be pleased beyond one's expectations (idiom); overjoyed at the turn of events

喜則氣緩.definition: joy depresses one's qi vital breath; an excess of joy may lead to sluggishness of vital energy (TCM)

喜力.definition: Heineken (Dutch brewing company); see also 海尼根[Hai3 ni2 gen1]

喜報.definition: announcement of joyful news; CL:張|张[zhang1]

喜大普奔.definition: (of news etc) so thrilling that everyone is rejoicing and spreading the word (Internet slang); acronym from 喜聞樂見|喜闻乐见[xi3 wen2 le4 jian4], 大快人心[da4 kuai4 ren2 xin1], 普天同慶|普天同庆[pu3 tian1 tong2 qing4] and 奔走相告[ben1 zou3 xiang1 gao4]

喜好.definition: to like; fond of; to prefer; to love; one's tastes; preference

喜子.definition: Tetragnatha (long-jawed spider); same as 蟢子

喜山白眉朱雀.pinyin: xi3 shan1 bai2 mei2 zhu1 que4
喜山白眉朱雀.definition: (bird species of China) Himalayan white-browed rosefinch (Carpodacus thura)

喜山紅眉朱雀.pinyin: xi3 shan1 hong2 mei2 zhu1 que4
喜山紅眉朱雀.definition: (bird species of China) Himalayan beautiful rosefinch (Carpodacus pulcherrimus)

喜山鵟.definition: (bird species of China) Himalayan buzzard (Buteo refectus)

喜山點翅朱雀.pinyin: xi3 shan1 dian3 chi4 zhu1 que4
喜山點翅朱雀.definition: (bird species of China) spot-winged rosefinch (Carpodacus rodopeplus)

喜形於色.definition: face light up with delight (idiom); to beam with joy

喜從天降.definition: joy from heaven (idiom); overjoyed at unexpected good news; unlooked-for happy event

喜德.definition: see 喜德縣|喜德县[Xi3de2 Xian4]

喜德縣.definition: Xide County in Liangshan Yi Autonomous Prefecture 涼山彝族自治州|凉山彝族自治州[Liang2shan1 Yi2zu2 Zi4zhi4zhou1], Sichuan

喜怒哀樂.definition: four types of human emotions, namely: happiness 歡喜|欢喜[huan1 xi3], anger 憤怒|愤怒[fen4 nu4], sorrow 悲哀[bei1 ai1] and joy 快樂|快乐[kuai4 le4]

喜愛.definition: to like; to love; to be fond of; favorite

喜憨兒.definition: (Tw) intellectually impaired child or youth (affectionate term)

喜提.definition: (neologism c. 2018) to be thrilled to receive; to excitedly take delivery of

喜新厭舊.definition: lit. to like the new, and hate the old (idiom); fig. enamored with new people (e.g. new girlfriend), bored with the old

喜歡.definition: to like; to be fond of

喜當爹.definition: (neologism c. 2012) (slang) to become a stepfather when one's partner turns out to be pregnant with a child she conceived with another lover

喜笑顏開.definition: grinning from ear to ear (idiom); beaming with happiness

喜糖.definition: sweet given on a happy occasion (esp. wedding)

喜結良緣.definition: (idiom) to get happily married; to form an auspicious union

喜結連理.definition: to tie the knot (idiom); to get married

喜聞樂見.definition: to love to hear and see (idiom); well received; to one's liking

喜蛋.definition: red-painted eggs, traditional celebratory gift on third day after birth of new baby

喜衝衝.definition: to beam with joy; in a happy mood

喜躍抃舞.definition: (idiom) to clap and dance in joy

喜車.definition: wedding car; carriage for collecting the bride

喜酒.definition: wedding feast; liquor drunk at a wedding feast

喜錢.definition: tip given on a happy occasion (traditional)

喜陽.definition: heliophile; tending towards the sun; heliotropism

喜雨.definition: welcome fall of rain; seasonable rain

喜餅.definition: double happiness cakes, pastries offered by a man to his fiancée's family at the time of their engagement

喜馬拉雅中杜鵑.pinyin: Xi3 ma3 la1 ya3 zhong1 du4 juan1
喜馬拉雅中杜鵑.definition: (bird species of China) Himalayan cuckoo (Cuculus saturatus)

喜馬拉雅山脈.pinyin: Xi3 ma3 la1 ya3 shan1 mai4
